amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to expand public and private forestry and watershed management partnerships by reducing redundancy for existing water source management plans and increasing the number of eligible entities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Valadao amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Valadao amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
